about.summary:
LFTP is a sophisticated file transfer program supporting a number of network protocols
(ftp, http, sftp, fish, torrent). Like BASH, it has job control and uses the readline
library for input. It has bookmarks, a built-in mirror command, and can transfer
several files in parallel. It was designed with reliability in mind.

name: lftp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.8.4" %}
{% set am_version = "1.15" %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: lftp
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: http://lftp.yar.ru/ftp/lftp-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 19f3a4236558fbdb88eec01bc9d693c51b122d23487b6bedad4cc67ae6825fc2

build:
  number: 1001
  # Windows build fails due to missing [n]curses.h or terminfo.h
  skip: True                       # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - posix                        # [win]
    - m2-bison                     # [win]
    - m2-autoconf                  # [win]
    - m2-automake{{ am_version }}  # [win]
    - m2-libtool                   # [win]
    - {{native}}pkg-config

  host:
    - python                       # [win]
    - openssl
    - readline                     # [not win]
    - ncurses                      # [not win]
    - {{native}}openssl
    - expat
    - zlib
    - m2-libreadline               # [win]
    - m2-ncurses                   # [win]
    - {{native}}libiconv
    - {{native}}gettext
    - {{native}}xz

  run:
    - {{native}}openssl
    - expat
    - zlib
    - {{native}}libiconv
    - {{native}}gettext
    - readline                     # [not win]
    - ncurses                      # [not win]
    - m2-libreadline               # [win]
    - m2-ncurses                   # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - lftp --version

about:
  home: https://lftp.yar.ru/
  license: GPL_v3
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: |
    LFTP is a sophisticated file transfer program supporting a number of network protocols
    (ftp, http, sftp, fish, torrent). Like BASH, it has job control and uses the readline
    library for input. It has bookmarks, a built-in mirror command, and can transfer
    several files in parallel. It was designed with reliability in mind.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - epruesse
    - croth1
